name: Into the Crabyss
description:
From the Creators of Enter The Crabyss

After sighting a kaiju destroying a city, Crabulon decides then and there that he wants to become a massive Kaiju and destroy cities himself. He finds out that he must venture deep down into the dangerous ocean to acquire what he seeks.

Created for Kaiju Jam II

--Credits--

Octopus - Programming, Art, Game Design

Fish125 - Cutscenes

Red Weirdo - Voice Acting

Featuring music by Kevin MacLeod

--Change Log--

v1.1 - Bug fixes and minor adjustments
